    • Constructor Detail

      • GamePiece

        public GamePiece(int x,
                 int y,
                 int size,
                 int r,
                 int c)
        * Constructor where color and image are randomly chosen out of a predefined set

        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the piece
        y - the y position of the piece
        size - the width and height of the piece
        r - the row where the piece exists in the board
        c - the column where the piece exists in the board

      • GamePiece

        public GamePiece(int spaceSize,
                 int size,
                 int r,
                 int c)
        Constructor where x and y are calculated instead of passed
        Parameters:
        spaceSize - the size of the space in between pieces + the size of the piece itself
        size - the size of the piece
        r - the row where the piece exists in the board
        c - the column where the piece exists in the board

      • GamePiece

        public GamePiece(int x,
                 int y,
                 int size,
                 GamePiece.Color color,
                 int r,
                 int c)
        Constructor where color is passed as a parameter instead of randomized
        Parameters:
        x - the x position of the piece
        y - the y position of the piece
        size - the width and height of the piece
        color - the color of the piece
        r - the row where the piece exists in the board
        c - the column where the piece exists in the board

                       int y,
                       int size)
        Resizes and moves the piece
        Parameters:
        x - the x of the target location
        y - the y of the target location
        size - the size to which the piece will be set

      • initImage

        private void initImage()
        initializes the image of the piece and sets the size and location of both the static and animated images

      • updateImage

        private void updateImage()
        updates the image of the piece to either be animating or static depending on the active state of the piece

      • clearPiece

        public void clearPiece()
        clears all images from the piece's visuals

      • toggleActive

        public void toggleActive()
        Toggles the active state of the piece. If static, it will start animating, and vice-versa

      • getColorType

        public GamePiece.Color getColorType()
        getter for the Color of the piece (note that this is the enum color, not the actual RGB color
        Returns:
        the enum color of the piece

      • animating

        public boolean animating()
        Checks if the piece is animating (moving on the board)
        Returns:
        True if the piece is moving

      • updateLocation

        private void updateLocation()
        Updates the piece's location on the board.

      • getNextPoint

        private acm.graphics.GPoint getNextPoint()
        Gets the next point in the sequence of movement points
        Returns:
        The point or null if there are no points remaining

        y - The Y position
